objects.query: Select Name, Description, ExternalId, ProductCode, Family, StockKeepingUnit, QuantityUnitOfMeasure, DisplayUrl, Audience__c, Product_Image_Static_Resource_Name__c, Available__c FROM Product2 WHERE Handcrafted_for_WHM_Demo_Scenario__c = true
SELECT Name, Description, DeveloperName, WorkspaceType FROM ContentWorkspace WHERE Name = 'Product Photos'
